allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix snap toggle, zoom-aware snapping, and various bug fixes

- Fix snap to endpoints toggle not working \(findLocalSnap now checks snapManager.isEnabled\(\)\)
- Add zoom-aware snap threshold so snapping feels consistent at all zoom levels
- Fix snap indicator circle disappearing when zoomed in \(scale radius/stroke inversely with zoom\)
- Fix polyline/path bounding box not updating after editing points
- Add history save when deleting objects with Delete key
- Add Ctrl+Z undo for TSplineTool \(was missing\)
- Remove debug console.log statements from EditTool
- Add keyboard shortcuts section to sidebar
- Fix bringToFront API for Fabric.js 7.x

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
